content.text:
Design a mobile application UI/UX using React Native with Expo for a Centralized Barangay Management System (CBS) in the Philippines. The app should feature a clean, modern, and community-friendly design using government-inspired colors (blue, green, and white). Include realistic background images of a barangay in the Philippines on the login/welcome screen.
The app must support two roles: Residents (Users) and Barangay Officials/Admins, with role-based dashboards and secure authentication.
Resident (User) Features & Screens
1.	Welcome / Login & Registration
o	Barangay photo background.
o	Role-based login (Resident / Admin).
2.	Resident Dashboard
o	Quick-access tiles: Request Documents, Pay Online, Announcements, My Requests, Profile, Directory.
o	Announcements carousel on top.
3.	Document Requests
o	Request Barangay Clearance, Residency, Indigency, Business Permit.
o	Auto-filled resident info in forms.
o	Status tracker (Pending, Payment Needed, Processing, Ready for Pickup).
4.	Payment Options
o	Online payments: GCash, PayMaya, Bank Transfer.
o	Face-to-face (F2F) payment option at Barangay Hall.
o	Upload proof of payment (screenshot/receipt photo).
o	Confirmation screen with reference number.
5.	My Requests / History
o	Track requests with payment & approval status.
o	Download soft copies (if approved).
o	Digital receipts.
6.	Announcements & Events
o	Newsfeed-style announcements.
o	Push notifications for urgent updates.
7.	Barangay Directory
o	Barangay Officials & Staff (Captain, Kagawad, Secretary, Treasurer).
o	Emergency Services: Police, Fire Department, Ambulance, Health Center.
o	Local Government Agencies: DPWH, DSWD, DepEd local office.
o	Utilities & Support: Water District, Electric Company, Waste Management, Disaster Response Hotline.
o	Click-to-call and map integration for each contact.
8.	Resident Profile
o	Editable profile, household members.
Barangay Admin / Staff Features & Screens
1.	Admin Dashboard
o	KPIs: Pending Requests, Payments Verified, Approved Requests, Announcements Posted.
o	Quick access to manage requests and residents.
2.	Document Management
o	View requests, check payment status.
o	Approve, reject, or mark ready.
o	Generate official documents with templates.
3.	Payment Verification
o	Validate uploaded proofs of payment.
o	Mark payments as Confirmed or Rejected.
o	Generate digital/printed receipts.
4.	Resident Management
o	Full resident database with search and filters.
o	Add/edit resident records.
5.	Announcement Management
o	Post announcements and schedule events.
o	Send push notifications.
6.	Directory Management
o	Add/update contact info of barangay officials, emergency services, agencies, and utilities.
o	Attach maps or external links for services.
7.	Report Generation
o	Monthly/quarterly reports on residents, documents, and payments.
o	Export to PDF/Excel.
8.	Admin Profile & Settings
o	Manage account details.
o	Role-based staff permissions.
Extra Features (Both Roles)
•	🔒 Secure login with role-based access.
•	🌐 Offline mode (auto-sync when online).
•	📲 Push notifications.
•	📊 Analytics for officials.
•	🧾 Digital receipts & payment history for transparency.
•	📌 Emergency one-tap dial for police, ambulance, or fire.
Deliverable:
•	Full Resident → Admin flow including payments.
•	Show Barangay photo background on login/welcome screen.
•	Ensure proof of payment upload & validation feature is included.
•	Barangay Directory must include officials, emergency contacts, agencies, and utilities.

Okay, I understand your vision for a Centralized Barangay Management System (CBS) mobile app using React Native and Expo. It's a comprehensive project with features for both residents and barangay officials. Here's a plan to get started:

**Features for the First Version:**

-   **Welcome/Login & Registration:** Implement the welcome screen with a barangay photo background and role-based login (Resident/Admin).
-   **Resident Dashboard:** Create the resident dashboard with quick-access tiles for key features like Request Documents, Pay Online, Announcements, and Profile. Include an announcements carousel at the top.
-   **Document Requests:** Develop the document request feature, allowing residents to request Barangay Clearance, Residency, Indigency, and Business Permits.

**Design Elements:**

-   **Colors:**
    -   Base color: White or light gray for a clean background.
    -   Primary text color: Dark blue or green for readability.
    -   Accent colors: Use shades of blue and green to highlight important elements and calls to action.
    -   Highlight shades: Lighter shades of blue or green for interactive elements.
-   **Typography:**
    -   Use modern, clean fonts like "Roboto" or "Open Sans" for a professional and readable look.

Let's create an elegant and functional mobile app!

I'll help you create a comprehensive Centralized Barangay Management System (CBS) mobile app using React Native and Expo. This is a substantial project, so I'll start by building the core structure and key screens.

Let me first examine the current project structure and then implement the app systematically.
Now I'll install the necessary dependencies for the Barangay Management System and create the app structure. I'll need to install some additional packages for better UI components and functionality.
